general.name: Nome
general.remove.confirm: Sei sicuro di voler rimuovere l'elemento {item}?

sessionExpired.title: Sessione scaduta
sessionExpired.message:
Sei stato disconnesso.
Puoi continuare a visualizzare la stessa pagina o accedere nuovamente.

results.none: Nessun risultato corrisponde ai criteri di ricerca

error.general: Si è verificato un errore imprevisto durante l'elaborazione della richiesta
error.serverOffline:
Il server non può essere contattato.
Per favore, riprova più tardi.
error.invalidRequest:
Non è possibile connettersi al server.
Assicurati di essere connesso a Internet e riprova tra pochi secondi.
error.uploadSizeExceeded: Il file caricato supera la dimensione massima consentita di {size}
error.validation: L'azione non può essere elaborata, poiché ci sono stati errori di convalida
error.staleEntity:
Questo dato non può essere salvato perché è stato modificato da qualcun altro.
Si prega di caricare nuovamente la pagina e riavviare l'operazione.
error.removeDataInUse: Questo elemento non può essere rimosso perché è attualmente in uso.

notFound.location: The location you typed or tried to access was not found
notFound.type: The requested data could not be found: {type}
notFound.typeKey: The requested data could not be found: {type} with key {key}

error.login: Il nome / password specificato non sono corretti. Riprova.
error.remoteAddressBlocked: Il tuo indirizzo IP è bloccato per aver superato i tentativi di accesso
error.permission: Non hai i permessi sufficienti per eseguire l'azione richiesta

unauthorized.address: Your IP address is not allowed to login
unauthorized.url: Access is not allowed from this URL

error.loggedOut: Sei stato disconnesso. Effettua nuovamente il login e ripeti l'operazione.
error.otp: Si è verificato un errore durante l'invio della password. Riprova più tardi.

securityAnswer.invalid: The given security answer is invalid
securityAnswer.disabled: By exceeding the number of security question attempts, this request has been aborted. Please, contact the administration

error.illegalAction: L'azione che hai tentato di eseguire non è valida

geolocation.denied: No permission to get the current location. Please, grant this permission in your browser.

login.title: Login
login.message: You can login with your username and password
login.disconnected:
You have been disconnected.
Please, login again in order to view the requested page.
login.register: Not a user yet? Register here.

password.confirmationMessage: Supply your {passwordType} to confirm this operation
password.confirm.noPassword: In order to confirm you need a {passwordType}, but you do not have any
password.confirm.device.active: In order to confirm, scan this QR-code with your mobile phone
password.confirm.device.none: In order to confirm you must have a trusted mobile phone but you do not have any
password.confirm.deviceOrPassword.active: In order to confirm, either scan this QR-code with your mobile phone or supply your {password}
password.confirm.deviceOrPassword.none: In order to confirm you must have a trusted mobile phone or supply your {password} but you do not have any
password.confirm.deviceOrOtp.noMediums:
In order to confirm you need either a trusted mobile phone (and you have none) or a confirmation password, but there are no possible mediums to receive it.
Please, contact the administration.
password.confirm.deviceOrOtp.active: In order to confirm, either scan this QR-code with your mobile phone, use the previously sent confirmation password or request a new one
password.confirm.deviceOrOtp.request: In order to confirm, either scan this QR-code with your mobile phone, or request a confirmation password below
password.confirm.otp.noMediums:
In order to confirm you need a confirmation password, but there are no possible mediums to receive it.
Please, contact the administration.
password.confirm.otp.active: You can use the previously sent confirmation password or request a new one
password.confirm.otp.request: Please, request a confirmation password below in order to confirm

error.disabled: Your password has been disabled. Please, contact the administration.
error.indefinitelyBlocked: Your password has been disabled by exceeding the maximum tries. Please, contact the administration.
error.temporarilyBlocked: Your password is temporarily blocked by exceeding the maximum tries.
error.expired: Your password has expired. Please, contact the administration.
error.pending: Your password is pending activation. Please, contact the administration.

forgotten.preface: Here you can recover your password. Fill in your user identification below. You can use one of the following:
forgotten.email: You will receive shortly an e-mail with your user identification and instructions on how to reset your password
forgotten.generated.message: Once you submit, a new password will be generated and sent to your e-mail address
forgotten.generated.done: You should receive shortly an e-mail with your new password.
forgotten.manual.done: Your password has been successfully changed. You can now use it to login.

expired.message.manual: In order to proceed, you must change it.
expired.message.generated:
In order to proceed, a new value must be generated.
This value will only be displayed once, so, make sure you either memorize it or write it down.
expired.generatedValue:
The value for {type} is {value}.
This value won't be displayed again, so, make sure you either memorize it or write it down.

action.change.generated.confirm: This will generate a new {type}, and the value will be displayed only once. Are you sure?
action.change.generated.done:
The value for {type} is {value}.
Make sure to memorize it, as it won't be displayed again.
action.unblock.confirm: Are you sure to unblock your {type}?
action.activate.confirm: This will activate your {type}, and the generated value will be displayed only once. Are you sure?
action.enable.confirm: Are you sure to enable your {type}?
action.disable.confirm: Are you sure to disable your {type}?

pendingAgreements.title: Updated agreement
pendingAgreements.message:
The registration agreement has been updated.

In order to continue, you must agree with the new terms.
pendingAgreements.agree: I agree with the following registration agreements: {agreements}

securityQuestion.message: The security question is required in case you need to reset your password. Once set, if you need to change it, contact the administration.
securityQuestion.question: Security question

passwords.pending: Il tuo {type} è in attesa di generazione.
passwords.securityAnswer: Dovresti impostare la domanda di sicurezza, che sarà necessaria nel caso in cui dovrai reimpostare la password.

transaction.noAccounts: Non hai nessun conto per eseguire il pagamento
transaction.noTypes: Non ci sono tipi di pagamento possibili
transaction.noTypesSelection: Non ci sono tipi di pagamento possibili da questo conto all'utente selezionato
transaction.recurringPayment.nowManual: Repeats until manually canceled, starting now
transaction.recurringPayment.dateManual: Repeats until manually canceled, starting at {date}
transaction.processed.withNumber: The payment with transaction number {number} was successfully processed
transaction.pending: The payment was submitted for further authorization
transaction.pending.withNumber: The payment with transaction number {number} was submitted for further authorization
transaction.authorizePending.done.stillPending: Il pagamento ha ancora bisogno di un'altra autorizzazione per essere processato
transaction.cancelAuthorization.done: L'autorizzazione di pagamento è stata annullata
transaction.blockScheduling.message: Questo impedirà l'elaborazione automatica delle rate pianificate
transaction.blockScheduling.done: Questo pagamento pianificato non sarà più elaborato automaticamente
transaction.unblockScheduling.message: Questo riprenderà l'elaborazione automatica per le rate pianificate
transaction.unblockScheduling.done: Questo pagamento pianificato verrà elaborato automaticamente
transaction.cancelScheduled.message: Questo cancellerà definitivamente questo pagamento pianificato
transaction.cancelScheduled.done: Questo pagamento pianificato è stato annullato
transaction.settleScheduled.message: Questo contrassegna permanentemente tutte le rate rimanenti come risolte
transaction.settleScheduled.done: Questo pagamento pianificato è stato completato
transaction.cancelRecurring.message: Questo cancellerà definitivamente il pagamento ricorrente e impedirà qualsiasi evento futuro
transaction.cancelRecurring.done: Questo pagamento ricorrente è stato annullato
transaction.chargebackTransfer.message: Questo restituirà l'importo di questo trasferimento al pagatore
transaction.processInstallment.message: Sei sicuro di voler elaborare ora la rata numero {number}?
transaction.settleInstallment.message: Sei sicuro di voler saldare la rata numero {number}?
transaction.processFailedOccurrence.message: Sei sicuro di voler processare ora l'occorrenza numero {number}?

error.minTime: Si dovrebbe attendere un periodo minimo di tempo per effettuare un pagamento di questo tipo.
error.balance: Saldo insufficiente per eseguire questa operazione
error.upperLimit: Non puoi eseguire questo pagamento perché il limite massimo del saldo del conto di destinazione è stato superato
error.daily.amount: Il massimo giornaliero di {amount} è stato superato
error.daily.count: Il numero massimo di pagamenti consentiti al giorno è {count}
error.weekly.amount: La massima quantità settimanale di {amount} è stata superata
error.weekly.count: Il numero massimo di pagamenti consentito per settimana è {count}
error.monthly.amount: La quantità massima mensile di {amount} è stata superata
error.monthly.count: Il numero massimo di pagamenti consentiti al mese è {count}

error.totalOpenAmount: L'importo totale di tutti i voucher aperti supererebbe il {maxAmount}, come definito in questo tipo di voucher. L'importo totale aperto attuale è {currentAmount}.

buy.amountForPeriod: L'acquisto di questo tipo di voucher è limitato per periodo. Fino a {date} solo {amount} è disponibile per l'acquisto.
buy.openAmount: L'utente attuale supera il limite consentito per Voucher non riscossi di {maxAmount}. L'importo aperto attuale è {currentAmount}.
buy.notAllowedForUser: The current user is not allowed to buy vouchers from this type.

redeem.status: This voucher cannot be redeemed. Its current status is: {status}.
redeem.user: The current user cannot redeem vouchers from this type.
redeem.notAllowedYet: This voucher cannot be redeemed before {beginDate}.
redeem.notAllowedToday: This voucher cannot be redeemed today. The days allowed for redeeming are: {allowedDays}.
redeem.userBlocked: You have been blocked by exceeding the number of allowed attempts.

error.status: This voucher cannot be redeemed. Its current status is: {status}.
error.user: The current user cannot redeem vouchers from this type.
error.notAllowedYet: This voucher cannot be redeemed before {beginDate}.
error.notAllowedToday: This voucher cannot be redeemed today. The days allowed for redeeming are: {allowedDays}.
error.userBlocked: You have been blocked by exceeding the number of allowed attempts.

redeem.confirm: The voucher details are given below. Please, review it below and confirm this action.

cancel.packConfirmation: Ci sono altri buoni appartenenti allo stesso pacchetto che saranno cancellati. Sei sicuro di continuare?
cancel.refundConfirmation: Sei sicuro di voler annullare e rimborsare questo voucher?
cancel.confirmation: Sei sicuro di voler annullare questo voucher?

voucher.cancelConfirmation: Sei sicuro di voler annullare questo voucher?
voucher.cancelPackConfirmation: Ci sono altri buoni appartenenti allo stesso pacchetto che saranno cancellati. Sei sicuro di continuare?

privacy.name: Privacy
privacy.private.tooltip: Questo campo è privato. Clicca per consentire ad altri di vederlo.
privacy.public.tooltip: Questo campo è visibile da altri. Clicca per renderlo privato.

image.manageMessage: You can drag / drop images to reorder them
image.manageAfterConfirm: After confirmation, please make sure to click the Save button in order for the changes to be applied.

file.manage.message: You can drag / drop files to reorder them

user.name: Full name
user.operator.registration.inactive: The operator {operator} has been registered, however, still needs activatation by the administration.
user.operator.registration.pending: The operator {operator} has been registered, however, still needs to validate their registration by confirming the e-mail.
user.contactInfo.none: There are currently no additional contacts
user.confirmation.message: To save your profile, provide your {type}
user.imagesChanged: To actually save the changes on images, the profile needs to be saved
user.newEmailConfirmed: Your new e-mail address was successfully confirmed
user.securityQuestion.message:
Se si dimentica la password, si dovrà rispondere correttamente alla domanda di sicurezza per reimpostare la password.
Questa può essere impostata più tardi, ma ricorda che il recupero della password non funzionerà senza domanda di sicurezza.

profile.noPermission: You don't have permission to view the profile of this user
profile.addContact.done: {user} was added to your contact list
profile.removeContact.done: {user} was removed from your contact list

registration.group.public: Choose the group you want to participate
registration.group.manager: Choose the group for the new user
registration.active.public: You have been successfully registered, and your account is now active.
registration.inactive.public:
Your account was successfully created.
However, you will need to be activated by the administration.
You will be notified when your account is active.
registration.pending.public:
Your registration has been submitted, and needs to be verified.
You should receive an e-mail shortly with instructions on how to activate your account.
If you don't receive the e-mail, make sure to check your spam / junk folder.
registration.active.manager: The user's account for {user} has been activated.
registration.inactive.manager: The user {user} has been registered, however, still needs activatation by the administration.
registration.pending.manager: The user {user} has been registered, however, still needs to validate their registration by confirming the e-mail.
registration.principal.multiple.preface: You can login with the following data:
registration.generatedPasswords.none: Ora puoi accedere con la password che hai.
registration.generatedPasswords.single: You will receive an e-mail shortly with your generated {type}.
registration.generatedPasswords.multiple: Riceverai una e-mail a breve con le seguenti password generate: {types}.

confirm.blocked: Are you sure to block access to {user}?
confirm.purged:
Are you sure to permanently remove {user} and remove all private data?
This action is irreversible!
confirm.removed:
Are you sure to permanently remove {user}?
This action is irreversible!

done.purged: {user} was permanently removed, together with all personal data

groupMembership.confirm: Are you sure to change {user} to group {group}?
groupMembership.confirm.aliasOperator: Are you sure to grant {user} the same permissions as the owner?

brokers.brokerAdded: The broker has been added successfully

verify.expired:
The verification code was not sent or has expired.
Please, send the code again to your phone and restart the process.
verify.maxAttempts:
You have exceeded the number of allowed attempts.
Please, send the code again to your phone and restart the process.

verify.title: Verify {number} for SMS
verify.message: Click the button above to send the verification code to your phone
verify.done: The verification code was sent to {number}

record.removeConfirm: Are you sure to remove this item?
